item.title: Money Router Brings A New AML Solution To The Financial Sector
item.description:
Money Router Brings A New AML Solution To The Financial Sector

Tackling money laundering is quickly becoming a tp priority in the financial sector today. Doing so is much harder than anticipated, however. Money Router is a new instant verification system that should be able to thwart money laundering. If more institutions used a distributed ledger, money laundering wouldn't be such an issue, to begin with.

item.title: Rex Linux Trojan Turns Infected Machines to Bitcoin Miners, Unleashes DDoS Attacks - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Rex Linux Trojan Turns Infected Machines to Bitcoin Miners, Unleashes DDoS Attacks - NEWSBTC

Rex Linux Trojan, an evolved malware capable of doing multiple things, including Bitcoin mining and DDoS attacks. Read more... The number of attacks on computers is increasing almost exponentially these days. The latest one to make news is the Rex Linux Trojan.

item.title: Verizon Files for Passcode Blockchain Patent
item.description:
Verizon Files for Passcode Blockchain Patent

Verizon Communications has filed a patent for a Blockchain technology for managing passcodes. The telecom giant, the largest in the US, filed the patent in May. The technology, apparently in development for years now, would deal with the management of digital rights.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 08/23/2016 - Bullish Channel Still in Play! - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Technical Analysis for 08/23/2016 - Bullish Channel Still in Play! - NEWSBTC

Bitcoin price could be ready for another bounce off the channel support as the bullish trend goes on. Bitcoin Price Key Highlights Bitcoin price could be ready for another bounce off the channel support as the bullish trend goes on.

item.title: Leading Dark Net Markets to Support Monero - Bitcoin News
item.description:
Leading Dark Net Markets to Support Monero - Bitcoin News

Privacy-centric cryptocurrency Monero (XMR) has been making waves in the community as of late. Most recently, it has been revealed that the digital currency will be used by leading Dark Net Markets. Also read: Mimblewimble Paper Proposes ' Near Complete' Bitcoin Anonymity on the Dark Net Markets (DNM) forum, Monero will be used by the According to a recent Reddit post Alphabay and Oasis marketplaces.

item.title: Is there a way to inherit bitcoin?
item.description:
Is there a way to inherit bitcoin?

What are the possible ways may father may have managed his bitcoin, and how can I find this out? How could I find out if he was using a third party to keep his bitcoin? I have no idea what I am looking for...

item.title: State of iGaming Online Gambling in the age of Crypto-currency
item.description:
State of iGaming Online Gambling in the age of Crypto-currency

Gambling remains one of the greatest American industries with a never-ending potential for growth. Online portion of the industry is still relatively small - 8 percent (although these 8 percent is 28.5 billion $. With a B). Furthermore, expected growth of this portion of the industry is roughly 9 percent annually.

item.title: US Marshals auction off $1.6M in bitcoin
item.description:
US Marshals auction off $1.6M in bitcoin

An anonymous bidder purchased 2,700 bitcoins worth roughly $1.6 million in an auction Monday held by the U.S. Marshals Service. CoinDesk, a website which reports on the digital currency, confirmed with the Marshals that four bids were received in the auction.

item.title: Could Russia Really be Behind the Recent Cyber Attacks?
item.description:
Could Russia Really be Behind the Recent Cyber Attacks?

Mounting evidence in the recent Democratic Party hacks, and the security breach to the Clinton administration is pointing to a Russian backed cyber army, according to a former Defense Department official and other security professionals. "This clearly has all indications of a larger strategic intelligence gathering operation," former IT specialist at the Defense Intelligence Agency, Bob Gourley said.

item.title: U.S. Plans to Ban Pokemon Go Permanantly
item.description:
U.S. Plans to Ban Pokemon Go Permanantly

It seems the DNC hacks have more than just democrats scared these days. Thoughts of malicious malware, and cyber attacks were unheard of some years ago, and lately it's all we've been reading about. With blames being pointed at several sources, it seems that we may never know exactly who is responsible for the hacks.
